text: Ware wa kare-ra no kokoronouchi no enkon o nozoki, kare-ra no ashimoto ni kawa o nagasu. Kare-ra wa iudearou. `Watashi-tachi o kono (kofuku) ni onmichibiki kudasa reta, arra o tataeru. Moshi arra no onmichibiki ga nakattanaraba, watashi-tachi wa kesshite (tadashiku) michibika renakattadearimashou. Omo no shito-tachi wa, tashikani shinri o tsutaemashita.'(-Goe ga ari) kare-ra wa yobikake rareru. `Kore ga rakuendearu. Anata gata wa (tadashi) okonai no tame ni, koko no kyoju-sha to nareta nodearu
